name: Nature's Resolve
description:
As a druid, you are trying to keep the forests alive and drive the deforesters along with their machines out of the way.

Your goal is to survive, along with the forest, for as long as you can.

Various waves of enemies will pursue you with the intent of stopping you from maintaining the liveliness of the forest and everything within.

The Deity of the Forest provided you with magical spells to counter the deforesters, luckily.

Art style: low-poly

The enemies will not interact with you at all unless you start rebuilding trees. They will mainly focus on chopping the trees down. Once you do get their attention, they will chase you down. If their path is blocked on the way to you, they will temporarily stop to cut the trees in their way.

You have two types of “currency”: mana, and acorns. Acorns are gathered from fallen enemies, and will allow you to upgrade your existing abilities. If the acorns are left unused in the inventory, you will be gaining increased movement speed. The mana, along with the health of the player, is regenerated automatically. The more trees alive, the quicker the regeneration.
